heading: HR00282
0: RESOLUTION EXPRESSING SUPPORT TO THE ORDER OF PRESIDENT DUTERTE DIRECTING THE BUREAU OF CORRECTIONS AND DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE THAT CONVICTED EX-MAYOR ANTONIO SANCHEZ BE EXCLUDED FROM THE MASS RELEASE OF CONVICTS, PURSUANT TO REPUBLIC ACT 10592
